snippet: Lawyers for Mr. Holsey argued that he was represented by a drunken lawyer, had an exceptionally harsh childhood and has a severe intellectual deficit.
abstract: Georgia parole panel refuses clemency to convicted murderer Robert Wayne Holsey, whose is execution by lethal injection is imminent; is not swayed by evidence that he was represented by drunken lawyer, had very harsh childhood and has severe intellectual deficit.
lead_paragraph: Lawyers for Mr. Holsey argued that he was represented by a drunken lawyer, had an exceptionally harsh childhood and has a severe intellectual deficit.

headline.main: Robert Wayne Holsey Faces Lethal Injection in Georgia
headline.print_headline: Man Faces Lethal Injection in Georgia
